data.text: @Amermalik12 @sabassheikh In the post match celebration videos that the Qalandars posted from stadium Sameen Rana mentions thst Aaqib Javed is isolating. Shortly after that they posted video of team going to see him. It makes no sense.
@Amermalik12 strange you visiting covid positive person and no one wearing mask 🤦🏻
@Amermalik12 I meant Shaheen or Haris could be asymptomatic after the exposure
@SohaibAlvi Asymptomatic people spread more - he had tested positive, hence why he wasn’t at the game,  so should have avoided the team. Or seen them from a distance.

@Amermalik12 I thought the same but then thought the bubble’s ended though Shaheen, Haris were supposed to leave next day to join Pak Test squad. Yes, isolation period was there but could’ve been asymptomatic. Or had to drop out of Test if +ve during isolation.
@sabassheikh Especially with two of your premier bowlers in such close proximity - without masks.

@Amermalik12 Exactly! I should have tweeted this yesterday but then would have faced lots of abuse. TBH, this is the mindset. The first thing in my mind was - this is not the last match of the season. In fact more important 🇵🇰 assignment is so close.
@Kam007_tweet I couldn’t believe it myself - I thought this the height of ignorance.
